{{ModuleFunction|SebasIRC}}
Sends a message to a Player

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool ircNotice(string user , string text)
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required arguments===
* '''user:''' Player name.
* '''text:''' The Text.

===Returns===
True if joined, otherwise false.
